languages.text: "Присасывается к телу жертвы — следовательно, паразит. Полагаю, это все, что нам надо знать, чтобы принять обоснованное решение об уничтожении этого создания".
"It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
languages.original_text: "Присасывается к телу жертвы — следовательно, паразит. Полагаю, это все, что нам надо знать, чтобы принять обоснованное решение об уничтожении этого создания".

traits.locale_text: "It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."
"It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

languages.text: “它会附着在受害者的身体上，因此它一定属于寄生生物。我认为，我们只要知道这些信息，就可以做出‘消灭这只生物’的理性决策。”
languages.original_text: "It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: “它会附着在受害者的身体上，因此它一定属于寄生生物。我认为，我们只要知道这些信息，就可以做出‘消灭这只生物’的理性决策。”

languages.text: «Se aferra al cuerpo de su víctima, por lo que debe de ser un parásito. Creo que eso es todo lo que necesitamos saber para tomar la decisión racional de destruir a la criatura».
languages.original_text: "It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: «Se aferra al cuerpo de su víctima, por lo que debe de ser un parásito. Creo que eso es todo lo que necesitamos saber para tomar la decisión racional de destruir a la criatura».

languages.text: 「犠牲者の身体を乗っ取るのです――すなわち、寄生生物に間違いございません。合理的に考えて、この生物を殺す必要があると進言いたします」
languages.original_text: "It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: 「犠牲者の身体を乗っ取るのです――すなわち、寄生生物に間違いございません。合理的に考えて、この生物を殺す必要があると進言いたします」

languages.text: « Étant donné que cette créature s'attache au corps de sa victime, il doit s'agir d'un parasite. Selon moi, nous n'avons pas besoin d'en savoir plus pour prendre la décision qui s'impose : celle de la détruire. »
languages.original_text: "It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: « Étant donné que cette créature s'attache au corps de sa victime, il doit s'agir d'un parasite. Selon moi, nous n'avons pas besoin d'en savoir plus pour prendre la décision qui s'impose : celle de la détruire. »

languages.text: "Es heftet sich an den Körper seines Opfers – also muss es ein Parasit sein. Ich denke, mehr müssen wir nicht wissen, um die rationale Entscheidung zu treffen, die Kreatur zu vernichten."
languages.original_text: "It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: "Es heftet sich an den Körper seines Opfers – also muss es ein Parasit sein. Ich denke, mehr müssen wir nicht wissen, um die rationale Entscheidung zu treffen, die Kreatur zu vernichten."

languages.text: "Kurbanının bedenine yapışıyor. Parazit olmalı. Bence mantıklı davranıp yaratığı ortadan kaldırmak için yeterli bir sebep."
languages.original_text: "It latches onto its victim's body — therefore, it must be a parasite. I suggest that this is all we need to know to make the rational decision to destroy the creature."

traits.locale_text: "Kurbanının bedenine yapışıyor, bir parazit olmalı. Bence yaratığı ortadan kaldırmak için yeterli bir sebep bu."
